guide.conclusion: To reassemble your device, follow these instructions in reverse order.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: Learn to make a paper airplane design which can be surfed on a wave of air. Trim the paper airplane to fly straight and slow then practice balancing it on a wave of air generated by a sheet of cardboard. You're a paper airplane pilot in no time!
guide.title: How to Paper Airplane Surfing
